rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall incorporating Bohemian decor with vibrant colors and ethnic patterns. The area is designed to provide a welcoming vibe while aligning with Vastu principles by ensuring a proper transition from the outer world to the inner sanctum.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large, open living area that embodies a Bohemian aesthetic with eclectic furnishings and natural lighting. Features include built-in storage for art pieces, comfortable seating arrangements, and versatile decor to host gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space integrated with the living area, featuring a reclaimed wood table and eclectic seating. The layout adheres to Vastu by positioning the dining area in the south-east corner for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and a Bohemian twist through colorful backsplash tiles. The layout respects Vastu by placing the stove in the southeast direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony, designed with Bohemian accents and earthy tones. Vastu principles are applied by positioning the bed in the southwest direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with comfortable furnishings and a Bohemian flair, ensuring ample storage and privacy. The room adheres to Vastu by optimizing natural light exposure.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated space for servants with basic amenities and a separate entrance. The design is cost-effective, ensuring essential comfort while adhering to local building norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming main entrance with a canopy and natural lighting. The placement is aligned with Vastu guidelines to invite positive energy.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A discreet service entrance for the servants, ensuring privacy and ease of access while maintaining overall aesthetic integrity.

levels_info.ground_floor: Residential living areas, kitchen, dining and bedrooms.
levels_info.upper_floor: Not defined in this plan, as the plan is designed for a G+1 house with all amenities on ground floor.

vastu_considerations: Rooms are placed according to Vastu guidelines where applicable (entrance, living, kitchen, master bedroom).
